ARABIC: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is nothing but a man possessed so wait a while and see what happens to him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is only a man possessed; so wait and watch him for a time."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He is a person who has been seized with a little madness; so wait for a while (perhaps he will improve)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is only an insane person. Wait for some time. Perhaps he will come to his senses."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “He is not but a man insane, therefore wait for some time.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He is only a man in whom is madness, so wait for him a while."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He is only a madman, so bear with him for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He is naught but a man bedevilled; so wait on him for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He is only a man in whom is a madness, so watch him for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is only a madman, so, as far as he is concerned wait for a while."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is only a man in whom is madness wherefore await for him for a season.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He is just a man possessed by madness. So bear with him for a while.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (And some said): "He is only a man possessed: wait (and have patience) with him for a time."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He is only a man in whom is madness, so wait for him a while."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is nothing else except a man who is mad, so watch him for awhile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is nothing but a man possessed. Just ignore him for a while.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:25] He, Noah, is just a man possessed by madness, a case of dementia. So bear with him for a while’, until he dies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He) i.e. Noah (is only a man in whom is a madness, so watch him) so wait (for a while) until he dies.
